    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static boolean initialize(boolean useNewIO)
        Initializes this abstract class's ClientImplementation instance to a default implementation using either Java's New or Old IO API.

        This method initializes the client using a default NIO or OIO implementation (from NewIO_Client or OldIO_Client).

        Resolving the old client implementation via the ClientImplementation.killClient() method is left as a task for the user.

        Parameters:
        useNewIO - Whether to use Java's New or Old IO API
        Returns:
        true, if the current client was replaced (as outlined in initialize(Supplier)'s documentation; otherwise, false
        See Also:
        initialize(Supplier), NewIO_Client, OldIO_Client, ClientImplementation, ClientImplementation.killClient()

      • initialize

        public static boolean initialize(Supplier<ClientImplementation> server)
        Initializes this abstract class's ClientImplementation instance to the provided implementation, provided it is not null.

        Resolving the old client implementation via the ClientImplementation.killClient() method is left as a task for the user.

        Parameters:
        server - A supplier which provides a new ClientImplementation
        Returns:
        true, if the provided ClientImplementation is not null; otherwise, false
        See Also:
        ClientImplementation, ClientImplementation.killClient()
